TopicTitle: Cool Vistas (and where to find them)

Articles.Content:
This idea  is inspired by @Vl3d and his/her suggestion for more places of interest to find and visit.

This is NOT for anomalies, they are covered elsewhere.  This is intended for those interesting or beautiful 'natural' features, locations and views that you come across and think are worth visiting, like a sort of 'tourist guide' of things to see.

Feel free to post images and locations etc.  and let's explore this new universe.

I'm unlikely to be able to explore too much myself until performance improves and/or I upgrade my kit  (2 FPS flying around Kerbin or close to Mun) but I will endeavour to do some, and will enjoy seeing what everyone else discovers.

Edited March 4, 2023 by pandaman

I don't have a picture, but the icy cliffs on the edge of Kerbins north polar caps are epic.

I have yet to discover more.

The Dress canyons near the mountain ridge and also the rings.

The Vall "subsurface ocean entrance".

All of Pol.

The Ike volcanoes.

Minmus has some interesting craters / cliffs and the best flats.

The Eve mountain top that's just above the clouds.

The Mohole now has a flat bottom where you can build a colony.

The giant Bop crater.

The clouds of Jool.

The very deep ice canyons of Eeloo.

The metallic regions of Gilly.

Looking out from the ridge of a big Mun crater.

Some photos here:

We really need KSP tourist colonies.

Edited March 4, 2023 by Vl3d
Wait I do actually have a picture.
